name: Yet Another Civilization Game
description:
Yet Another Civilization Game or YACG is a grand strategy game. You choose your civilization (choose between 40 historic nations), choose how many opponents you want to face and you directly land in -4000 BC. Now you need to carefully manage economy of your country, research new technologies and conquer other countries with your army. You can fight with AI or real people in hotseat multiplayer. You can play on randomly generated map or choose world map with historic locations.

The game is currently in active development, next update will feature majot tech tree redesign (over 140 new technologies, 40 new units, 2 new goverments) and rebellion & stability system. 

YACG development system is open for ideas and community features. Game is easily moddable (it does not require any programming skills). If you want to add your own textures, civilizations or units it can be done by simply editing text files. If you want to share your own ideas and content to be included in main release join game discord server:
https://discord.com/invite/MBxsNUzJGZ

KEY FEATURES:

  • over 40 historic nations, 400 leaders and 4000 historic cities and settlements
  • 2 world maps with historic start locations: medium (100x50) and huge (300x150)
  • AI and hotseat multiplayer gamemodes
  • multiple historic goverments which have all pros and cons
  • technology tree which unlocks new units and upgrades
  • clean UI
  • easy to mod and add new features
  • autosave
  • procdeuraly generated maps with different parameters
  • small size, game is under 150 MB
  • supports both Windows and Linux
